COMMAND.NAME: taskbytes
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.

DESCRIPTION.P: Return the number of characters the last/current task has dumped into the given buffer.
NOTE: this count is only reset when a task is launched.

COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
